itemDescription: English association football player and concert promoter, born 1938

wikipedia_page.main: Brian Thompson (1938–2011) was an English goalkeeper, who played for Grantham Town, Loughborough and Peterborough United.

response: Brian Thompson is an American actor.
Brian Thompson may also refer to:
*Brian Thompson (footballer, born 1938) (1938–2011), English professional footballer and concert promoter
* Brian Thompson (1938-2011), footballer and concert promoter

Brian Thompson (born 9 February 1950) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Oxford United and Torquay United, in non-League football for Chelmsford City, and was on the books of Wolverhampton Wanderers without making a league appearance.

Towards the end of 1966, Grantham promoter, former footballer Brian Thompson, set about booking Geno Washington and the Ram Jam Band and The Move. Their management persuaded Thompson to also book three relatively unknown acts at that time, being Pink Floyd, The Jimi Hendrix Experience and Cream.
